review: Great connections for streaming.  A pleasure to use with my iPad. Netflix never looked so good. I wish Amazon would work with Google on this one.
author: Pompano Larry

review: Really good, we use it a lot in the family.  We share videos and watch TV series from Netflix.
author: Carmela Velazquez

review: I love it!!!, You can cast even your phone!
author: Fernanda K.

review: It's a cheap and slick solution. But, unstable. Good for low interaction mode though, if you are simply interested in starting a movie on netflix and let it run.
author: Anon

review: A week of headache later I returned it.
author: Troy Nachtigall

review: Works seamlessly.  A fraction of a second delay when casting but great!
author: Jose Augusto Acevedo

review: I like the simplicity of using chromcast,  5 mins and every thing was ready.  I think there is lot of improvements that can be done,  for example to let me stream EVERY thing on my smartphone and not only youtube.
author: Omar
